query:
INSERT INTO activity_spots (islandGuideId, name, spotType, difficulty, description, bestSeason, latitude, longitude, createdAt, updatedAt) 
SELECT 
  ig.id,
  'Maradhoo Kandu',
  'dive_site',
  'Advanced',
  'Deep channel dive with strong currents and large pelagics',
  'Mar-Oct',
  -0.61,
  73.14,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
FROM island_guides ig WHERE ig.slug = 'maradhoo' LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  ig.id,
  'Vaavu Kandu',
  'dive_site',
  'Intermediate',
  'Channel dive with reef sharks and turtles',
  'Mar-Oct',
  3.56,
  73.52,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
FROM island_guides ig WHERE ig.slug = 'fulidhoo' LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  ig.id,
  'Miyaru Kandu',
  'dive_site',
  'Advanced',
  'Fast-moving channel with sharks and rays',
  'Mar-Oct',
  3.62,
  72.95,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
FROM island_guides ig WHERE ig.slug = 'dhigurah' LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  ig.id,
  'Veligandu Kandu',
  'dive_site',
  'Intermediate',
  'Scenic channel dive with colorful reef',
  'Mar-Oct',
  3.68,
  72.87,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
FROM island_guides ig WHERE ig.slug = 'veligandu' LIMIT 1

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  ig.id,
  'Fesdu Kandu',
  'dive_site',
  'Beginner',
  'Gentle channel with abundant marine life',
  'Mar-Oct',
  4.18,
  72.97,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
FROM island_guides ig WHERE ig.slug = 'rasdhoo' LIMIT 1;
